rules.v: error 0 - No data in last 24 hours
error 0 - No data in last 24 hours

func:
values = new Object()
values.series=["heaters"]
values.data = [[]]
values.labels= ""
status=1
msg.energy = Math.round(msg.payload.temp_stats["Consumption (KJ)"]/36)/100
i=msg.payload.temp_stats.timestamps.length-1
dates = []
while (i>=0){
    let date = new Date(msg.payload.temp_stats.timestamps[i])
    dates.push(date)
    i--
}

dates.sort(function(a, b) {
    return a<b ? -1 : a<b ? 1 : 0;
});

i=0
v1=new Object()
v1.x=dates[i]
v1.y=status
values.data[0].push(v1)
i++
while (i<msg.payload.temp_stats.timestamps.length){
    v1=new Object()
    v1.x=dates[i]
    v1.y=status
    status =(status+1)%2
    v2=new Object()
    let date = new Date(dates[i].getTime()+1)
    v2.x=date
    v2.y=status
    i++
    values.data[0].push(v1)
    values.data[0].push(v2)
}

v1=new Object()
v1.x=Date.now()+10000
v1.y=status
values.data[0].push(v1)
msg.payload=[values]
msg.price =Math.round(msg.energy * global.get("price")*100)/100; 

return msg

format: Consumption of the heaters last 24h: {{msg.energy}} kWh(~{{msg.price}}€)

func:
values = new Object()
values.series=["window"]
values.data = [[]]
values.labels= ""
status=1

i=msg.payload.windows_record.length-1
dates = []
while (i>=0){
    let date = new Date(msg.payload.windows_record[i])
    dates.push(date)
    i--
}

dates.sort(function(a, b) {
    return a<b ? -1 : a<b ? 1 : 0;
});

i=0
v1=new Object()
v1.x=dates[i]
v1.y=status
values.data[0].push(v1)
i++
while (i<msg.payload.windows_record.length){
    v1=new Object()
    v1.x=dates[i]
    v1.y=status
    status =(status+1)%2
    v2=new Object()
    let date = new Date(dates[i].getTime()+1)
    v2.x=date
    v2.y=status
    i++
    values.data[0].push(v1)
    values.data[0].push(v2)
}

v1=new Object()
v1.x=Date.now()+10000
v1.y=status
values.data[0].push(v1)
msg.len=msg.payload.windows_record.length
msg.payload=[values]

return msg

user=global.get("activeUser")
house=global.get("selectedHouse")
room=global.get("thresholdRoom")
msg.url = "127.0.0.1:8080/catalog/threshold_temperature"+"/"+user+"/"+house+"/"+room+"/?threshold_min="+msg.payload.min+"&threshold_max="+msg.payload.max
value=new Object()
value.min = msg.payload.min
value.max=msg.payload.max
msg.payload=value
return msg;

global.set("allUsers",msg.payload)

msg.options=msg.payload
delete msg.payload
return msg;

global.set("Houses",msg.payload)
msg.options=msg.payload
delete msg.payload
